00025 #ifndef LOGGER_H
00026 #define LOGGER_H
00027 
00028 #include <stdio.h>
00029 
00030 #ifdef __cpluplus
00031 extern "C" {
00032 #endif
00033 
00034 struct logger_data;
00035 
00037 struct logger
00038 {
00039   struct logger_data *private; 
00040   void (*sys_err) (const char *file, unsigned int line,
00041                    const char *msg, ...); 
00042   void (*app_err) (const char *file, unsigned int line, int error_num,
00043                    const char *msg, ...); 
00046   void (*err) (const char *file, unsigned int line,
00047                const char *msg, ...); 
00048 };
00049 
00051 #define SYS_ERR(msg, ...) sys_err (__FILE__, __LINE__, msg , ## __VA_ARGS__)
00052 
00054 #define APP_ERR(error_num, msg, ...) app_err (__FILE__, __LINE__, error_num, \
00055                                               msg , ## __VA_ARGS__)
00056 
00058 #define ERR(msg, ...) err (__FILE__, __LINE__, msg , ## __VA_ARGS__)
00059 
00061 extern struct logger *l;
00062 
00064 #define GLOBAL_LOGGER struct logger logger = {0}; struct logger *l = &logger
00065 
00076 int
00077 init_logger (const char *log_output, const char *(*err2str) (int));
00078 
00083 void
00084 destroy_logger (void);
00085 
00092 #define SETUP_LOGGER(log_output, err2str) do {                          \
00093     if (!atexit (destroy_logger) && !init_logger (log_output, err2str)) \
00094       break;                                                            \
00095     fprintf (stderr, "Cannot setup logger\n");                          \
00096     exit (EXIT_FAILURE);                                                \
00097   } while (0)
00098 
00099 #ifdef __cplusplus
00100 }
00101 #endif
00102 
00103 #endif /* LOGGER_H */
